alert.note: Alert for Dallam (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 4:39PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Cimarron and northern Dallam Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 439 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Seneca, or 15 miles northeast of Clayton, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Boise City, Felt and Wheeless. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
